name: ThumbsUpSurvey WP Client
author: Nexus Media Co Ltd

sections.description:
The plugin provides the necessary shortcodes and a builder to easily add your surveys in any page or post, including all possible options, such as web or form, even for SalesForce embedded chat.

For more information, visit https://thumbsupsurvey.com/.

Features

  • Easy to build surveys
  • Multiple layouts:
    • Web view
    • Form view
    • Salesforce embedded chat
  • Newsletter support
  • Zapier support
  • Integration with 3rd party services
  • Advanced display functionality based on:
    • Click event
    • Automatic display after a specific delay
    • Javascript method call
  • Easy themeing and styling (check different case studies)

For more information visit our website: https://thumbsupsurvey.com/.

Important Note

This plugin relies on a third-party service provided by ThumbsUp Survey to function properly. By using this plugin, you agree to abide by ThumbsUp Survey’s terms of use and privacy policy.

Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Before using this plugin, please review ThumbsUp Survey’s terms of use and privacy policy:
– Terms of Use: https://thumbsupsurvey.com/terms-and-conditions
– Privacy Policy: https://thumbsupsurvey.com/privacy-policy

Third-Party Service Integration

This plugin relies on a third-party service, ThumbsUpSurvey.com, to provide the survey functionality. The plugin works as a helper for setting up the correct parameters and initiates the call to the main script coming from ThumbsUpSurvey.com

For more information, please visit ThumbsUpSurvey.com.

Support

For support or inquiries, please contact info[@]thumbsupsurvey.com.

License

This plugin is released under the GPL-2.0-or-later license. For more information, please refer to the license link.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/thumbsupsurvey-wp-client directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use one of the three available shortcodes [thumbsupsurvey-web], [thumbsupsurvey-form], [thumbsupsurvey-salesforce] within a page or a post, using the necessary license key.
  4. Use the helper to set up the shortcode with all the possible options.

For more information, visit our Knowledgebase: https://thumbsupsurvey.com/using-the-survey-with-wordpress/.
sections.changelog:
1.3.6

  • 06/24/2024
  • Bug fix: Class selector when opening a survey through a click event

1.3.2

  • 05/15/2024
  • Initial WordPress plugin
